availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Griffey (Louisville, Kentucky, street inspector.)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, street inspector. Kentucky native. Married ot Martha Dowdall Griffey in Jefferson County, Kentucky on September 2, 1841. Father of Sarah, John S. and Henry C. Griffey. Street inspector in Louisville, Kentucky 1850. Street inspector in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville District 3, p. 327B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 7, p. 536.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482706, p. 174
